com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent
Class NetworkAwareControllerWrapper

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.NetworkAwareControllerWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAdaptorController
public final class NetworkAwareControllerWrapper
extends Object
implements IAdaptorController

This is a Burstly ad types implementation. This class acts as a wrapper around specific implementations.

setPrefetchedRequest

public void setPrefetchedRequest(boolean isPrefetched)
Description copied from interface: IAdaptorController
Set to true if this component was prefetched. This means that no standard lifecycle should be invoked. Component will be created but won't be shown until next request for ad.

Specified by:
setPrefetchedRequest in interface IAdaptorController
Parameters:
isPrefetched - true is this component was prefetched
